artist: After Raphael Sanzio; Bentricius, Der Meister mit dem Würfel
description: man tied to tree at left; man with knife in hand on one knee; man with lyre, seated, pointing; man seated at right; all figures in foreground; arched bridge left middle ground; gate with arch middle ground center; field with sheep left distance; trees at right middle ground; hills and fields at distance
marks:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in b See Inscription
title: Romæ apud Philippum Thomassinu
